dict.acceptation: 观众，听众，读者；读者；接见；拥护者，爱好者；

sent.orig: The soprano held the audience; This story held our interest; She can hold an audience spellbound.
sent.trans: 那个女高音吸引了观众的注意；这个故事吸引了我们的。

sent.orig: Redefine your audience generally means changing how you see your audience.
sent.trans: 重新定义听众通常意味着改变你对听众的看法。

sent.orig: When the rotating stage, the audience can see the audience shouting Huahua.
sent.trans: 当舞台旋转时，全场观众都看得哗哗大叫。

sent.orig: Know your audience-Make sure your speech appropriate for your audience.
sent.trans: 了解自己的听众—确保自己的演讲内适合听众。

sent.orig: The relationship between media and audience, the audience is another important part of the study.
sent.trans: 媒介与受众的关系，是受众研究的又一重要内容。
